channel.title: Welcome to mangOH forum!
channel.description:
## Welcome!
This forum is used by the community around **[Project mangOH](http://mangoh.io)** to help one another to use mangOH, team up and contribute to mangOH.
Use the [category **mangOH Green**](http://forum.mangoh.io/c/mangoh-green) for any discussion or question related to the usage of mangOH Green. Use the [category **mangOH Red**](http://forum.mangoh.io/c/mangoh-red) for any discussion or question related to the usage of mangOH Red. Use the [category **Build your own**](http://forum.mangoh.io/c/build-your-own) for any discussion or question related to building or designing your own hardware based on mangOH designs.
**Is it your first time?**
If this is your first time on this forum, don't forget to say hello and introduce yourself briefly in the [water cooler discussions category](/c/water-cooler-discussions) so that other members can better know you.
Happy mangOH experience!
_.team mangOH._
